thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: Karl O Grady
thread.title_full: MicksGarage.com reviewed by Karl O Grady

author: Karl O Grady
title: Karl O Grady
text:
Phoned the office 3 times today and was about to go else where as no one was in any way helpful and seemed as though they were saying - just check online and do it yourself! But when I emailed for support in Mikeys brief email he helped me more than all three phone calls today!
Thanks!
Ps - I later phoned the no he gave me for roof rack support and the lad I spoke to was equally as helpful and went out of his way to answer a difficult question I had re fixed points on van. Can't remember his name but he was very nice!!
Thanks
